title: FanOut pattern as a function
body:
Hi, this is a proposal for a new function in the sync package.

This is a small pattern I use with WaitGroup to wait for a group of go routines that I repeat for almost every go program I write. I have been copy-pasting it around until recently, now it's tiny library:
https://github.com/anderejd/syncext

Is there something similar in the standard library already? Am I going about this all wrong? It's just 14 lines of code, but to me that means 14 lines less to write every time I want to use this pattern.

The details of the proposal including a use case is in README.md in the repos.

Any kind of feedback welcome! :)
